**************** TEMPLATE ***************
R TYPE
i.e. add $rd, $rs, $rt
[opcode, rs, rt, rd, shift amount, func]

000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100000 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100001 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100010 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100011 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100100 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100101 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100110 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 100111 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 101000 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 101001 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111000 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111001 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111010
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111011 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111100 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111101 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111110 
000000 00000 00001 00000 00000 111111


I-TYPE
i.e. add $rt, $rs, immediate
[opcode, rs, rt, immediate]

100011 00000 00001 0000000000000000
101011 00000 00000 0000000000000001

****************************************
HOW TO RUN: SIMULATE PROCESSOR TEST BENCH. ADD AND VIEW THE WAVEFORMS OF EACH COMPONENT (OR -
EVEN ALL OF THEM AT ONCE).
YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO VIEW THE WHOLE REGFILE ARRAY (CHANGING)

TEST BENEATH THIS LINE.
****************************************
-- SW $t0 $t1 2		\		$t0 = 0, $t1 = 1
101011 00000 00001 0000000000000010
ac010002

-- LW $t0 $t2 2		\		$t2 = 1
100011 00000 00010 0000000000000010
8c020002

-- ADD $t3 $t1 $t2	\		$t3 = 2
000000 00001 00010 00011  00000 100000
00221820

-- ADD $t4 $t3 $t3	\		$t4 = 4
000000 00011 00011 00100  00000 100001
00632021

-- SUB $t5 $t4 $t1	\		$t5 = 3
000000 00100 00001 00101  00000 100010
00812822

-- SUB $t6 $t4 $t3	\		$t6 = 2
000000 00100 00011 00110  00000 100011
00833023

-- AND $t7 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t7 = 0
000000 00110 00100 00111 00000 100100 
00c43824

-- OR $t8 $t6 $t4		\ 		$t8 = 6
000000 00110 00100 01000 00000 100101 
00c44025

-- XOR $t9 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t9 = 6
000000 00110 00100 01001 00000 100110 
00c44826

-- NOR $t10 $t0 $t31	\ 		$t10 = 0
000000 00000 11111 01010 00000 100111
001f5027
****************************************

-- SLT $t11 $t6 $t4	\ 		$t11 = 1
000000 00110 00100 01011 00000 101000
00c45828

-- SLT $t12 $t6 $t31\ 		$t11 = 1
000000 00110 11111 01100 00000 101000
00dF5828

-- SLTU $t13 $t6 $t4\ 		$t12 = 1
000000 00110 00100 01101 00000 101001
00c46029

****************************************
